A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I truly do not understand this audience rating. I was 5 years old when Star Wars hit theaters but didn't see it until the re-release in 1978\, just to establish my baseline. I won't claim that The Last Jedi is perfect\, but I will claim that it is fantastic. Beautifully shot\, well-acted\, dialogue that (mostly) doesn't make anyone wince\, and great characterization throughout. I sincerely feel like I've seen a different film than most of the reviewers here\, but then\, I'm sure they'll feel the same way.
